snippet: How much are parents shelling out to give their children a leg up in sports? A heck of a lot, Mark Hyman discovers.
abstract: Gordon Marino reviews book The Most Expensive Game in Town: The Rising Cost of Youth Sports and the Toll on Today's Families by Mark Hyman.
lead_paragraph: How much are parents shelling out to give their children a leg up in sports? A heck of a lot, Mark Hyman discovers.

headline.seo: ‘The Most Expensive Game in Town,’ by Mark Hyman
